καθώς,
adverb ={καθά}, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; even as, [NT]
__2 how, ὑπομιμνῄσκειν κ... Aristeas 263,[NT]
__II of Time, as, when,[LXX+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: as, just as, even as; in accordance with
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
as, just as, even as; in accordance with
as, just as, in the manner that, Mt. 21:6; 26:24; how, in what manner, Acts 15:14; according as, Mk. 4:33; inasmuch as, Jn. 17:2; of time, when, Acts 7:17
vocabInfos._es_Definition: como, tal como ; puesto que, por cuanto ; hasta donde, al grado que, en la medida en ; que (en discurso indirecto)
